channel.title: Characterizing Classes on Industrial Revolution Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Characterizing Classes on Industrial Revolution Documentation

item.title: ConstructionSite
item.description: The ConstructionSite component class represents a construction site on the game map . The game object of this component also needs to have the following components: Selectable Stocks

item.title: Industry
item.description: The Industry component class. The game object of this component also needs to have the following components: Selectable Stocks Trade Production

item.title: Nation
item.description: The Nation component class. It represents a nation . The game object of this component also needs to have the following components: Stocks Market

item.title: Settlement
item.description: Characterizing class of the settlement actor . The game object of this component also needs to have the following components: Selectable Market TradeNode

item.title: Transporter
item.description: The Transporter component class. Fields Transporter Type (train, ox-wagon, barge/scow , schooner, clipper) List of Cargos Transport Link Type (road, rail, sea lane, waterway) Transport Path (path for the transport network)
